name: Move to Trash from Admin Bar
author: Arroba Digital

sections.description:
Add a Move to Trash Button to delete posts or pages from the WordPress Admin Bar.

Just install the plugin; there are no additional settings to be made.
sections.installation:
The installation is pretty standard:

  1. Upload the package contents to to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

There are no additional settings to be made.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.2 (released Nov 11, 2017)

  • Compatible with WordPress 4.9

Version 1.0.1 (released Feb 20, 2017)

  • Plugin name update.

Version 1.0.0 (released Feb 19, 2017)

  • Initial release.

There are no additional settings to be made.
